title: Sapling
desc:
Post 784
- This card has no special effects when stood on.
- In three turns, this card will build 5 783 cards on the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile in one empty direction and one 785 on each side of each 783.
- No <:builder:1119843481700012103> cards can be played in that adjacent direction off of this card until this card grows.
- This card is of the Wood subtype.
- This card takes 1 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
